overview: A trilogy of separate stories. In "Labyrinth labyrinthos", a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In "Running Man", a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In "Construction Cancellation Order", a man must shut down worker robots.
tagline: It's not just a city... It's a state of mind.
cast: Banjo Ginga|Masane Tsukayama|Hideko Yoshida|Iemasa Kayumi|Hiroshi Ôtake
